snippet: Eight of the 13 people facing criminal charges in the hazing death of a Florida A&M University marching band member have turned themselves in to the police, state officials said.
abstract: Eight of the 13 people facing criminal charges in the hazing death of Florida A&M University marching band member Robert Champion voluntarily turn themselves in to the police.
lead_paragraph: Eight of the 13 people facing criminal charges in the hazing death of a Florida A&M University marching band member have turned themselves in to the police, state officials said.

headline.main: Florida: Eight in Hazing Case Turn Themselves In to the Police
headline.print_headline: Florida: Eight In Hazing Case Turn Themselves In To the Police
